Name: I hate this game
About the game: Each level is a new mechanic. It will be funny! More than a hundred levels. 100 ordinary, 10 extra complex and 10 secret! Use the environment. Everything you see on the screen can help you get through, even an interface or a mouse! Retro atmosphere. Stylish pixel art graphics in two colors that can be customized! Fresh Chiptune / 8bit Soundtrack by HateBit! The main character like the last idiot got on a clickbait and downloaded 'the best game ever'. Mysteriously, he got inside the computer and to get out, he has to solve all the puzzles and just survive. Game developed Pixel Error Music by HateBit Intro comics - Oblom studio
